DOC.brief_summary: Establishment of a range of normal values in pregnancy with the Multiple Electrode Aggregometry (Multiplate@) device, a device that allows measurement of not only platelet count but platelet function. This has not been studied in ths special patient group. Results from this trial will be used as a basis for further investigation of abnormal platelet function in pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Platelet Function in Pregnancy With Multiple Electrode Aggregometry
